Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.0-beta4
Text:
- Reset Settings Button
- Tasty Rig Fixes
- Blender Export Options Finished
- LOD Support

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.0-beta3
Text:
Happy New Years Everyone!! We're getting super close to an official release so this update is a small but important one!!
- Tasty Rig
- Theme Support

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.0-beta2
Text:
- Initial Foliage Support
- Tab-Independent Search Filter
- Reoriented Bones Support

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.0-beta1
Text: The first official beta release of Fortnite Porting V2 is finally here!!
